Its unique soft-body physics and the procedural generated levels make the game different and challenging every time you play.</p><p>The goal is simple: go as deep as possible. For completing such a task you need to dodge the monsters as well as eating the white cells that are keeping you alive. The game is punctuated by special pills that give the blob a weird yet amazing power. How far can you go?</p><p>Packed with cool features:<br>- Realistic soft-body physics<br>- Google Play leaderboards<br>- Two control schemes: tilt or touch<br>- Awesome super bonus pills<br>- It’s a Zombie Tsunami out there, and everyone is invited!<p>REVIEWS<br>5/5 TouchGen.net - "If you’re looking for a fantastic game, look no further!" <br>4.5/5 TouchArcade - "Zombie Tsunami is a game you really need to own"<br>5/5 AppSmile - "Featuring Pixar-like graphics, simple controls, and plenty of content"<br>4.5/5 148Apps - "It’s fun madness, emphasis on fun."<br>5/5 iReviewT.com - "Revolutionary endless runner formula!"<br>5/5 AppSpy.com - "Zombie Tsunami carves its own path with a great claymation style and roaming hordes of the walking, and jumping dead"</p><p><br>FEATURES<br>- Add as many zombies to your hoard as you can.<br>- Frantic flesh-eating fun for all the family!<br>- Keep going as long as at least one zombie is still running (and it doesn’t have to be the zombie you started with).<br>- Collect 8 different power-ups and bonuses to run further and destroy more.<br>- Turn over cars, buses, vehicles and tanks to eat the survivors inside.<br>- 300+ different missions to devour.<br>- 9 worldwide locations to stampede your zombies through.<br>- Optimized for all models of Android smartphones<br>- Featuring Blast Processing</p><p><br>DESCRIPTION<br>Beginning with a single zombie running through the streets, chase down the living and add them to your chaotic procession of dashing undead. Devour the bonuses and power-ups to activate the Giant Zombie with multiple lasers shooting out of its many eyeballs, sneak around the cities as a netherworld Ninja, or clone members of your zombie hoard with the UFO.</p><p>Zombie Tsunami is a fun-packed thrill-ride of destruction, excitement and tasty brains! We do not overly spam ads or place ads to encourage accidental clicks.</p><p>This game contains in-app purchases. No content is blocked via in-app purchases. </div>  <div class="description">  卡通战争 是一款街机战争游戏，结合了塔防公式和实时策略游戏的玩法。<br> <br>─────────────────────<br> <br>评论家说<br> <br>“超棒的游戏，让你玩几个小时依然爱不释手... 这是我在 App Store 上发现的塔防和实施策略游戏的最佳结合体。”- AppVersity<br> <br>“趣味横生的玩法... 混乱的战斗不缺少壮观的场景和激动人心的体验。”- Pocket Gamer<br> <br>“令人难以置信的游戏深度，这是 App Store 上最令人上映的游戏之一。满 5 星评价” - AppSmile<br> <br>─────────────────────<br> <br>场景<br> <br>存在于卡通世界的两个部落；邪恶的彩色部落和他们的奴隶，以及黑白卡通部落。<br>黑白卡通部落世世代代都被视为财产，从而被迫成为努力。<br>幸运的是... 在黑白卡通部落中出现了一批有着巨大理想的英雄。<br>他们聚集起来，开始反抗来重获自由，向彩色部落宣战。<br> <br>不可避免的战争已经打响... 成为黑白卡通部落的英雄，让你的人民重获自由。<br> game.</p><p>Equipment:<br>Equipment can be made by using “souls” or by collecting “materials” that are dropped by your enemies in battle.</p><p>Hints:<br>-Run around the stage and find vantage Claw games are filled with tense moments of wondering if the claw will drop your prize, coupled with the triumph of finally receiving it! PRIZE CLAW recreates that experience for your Android while adding many exciting new features! </p><p>Step up to the machine and maneuver the claw to grab coins, gems, stuffed animals, cars, dolls, and so many more! This claw game is much more than the standard grabbing you get from arcade machines, however: PRIZE CLAW is filled with all sorts of unique items, powerful effects and challenging missions. Special gems grant you bonuses to enhance your collection power, and you can trade the prizes you collect for extra special bonuses. Tons of prizes aren't the only thing you can trade in: All the coins you collect can be spent to upgrade your claw, activate your unique powers and even customize your machine! If you run out of grabs, don't fret! It won't take long before you receive more. Keep checking back to complete your collection and unlock more stuff!</p><p>Features:<br>- More than 60 prizes to collect!<br>- Multiple machines to play on with different prizes, powers and buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.greenmango.game.bubbleshooter"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5ncmVlbm1hbmdvLmdhbWUuYnViYmxlc2hvb3RlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  泡泡龍2014（Bubble Shooter 2014）是一個免費的遊戲，由著名的遊戲開發者青芒果遊戲（Green Mango Games）為你呈現。這個遊戲非常好玩，而且很容易讓人欲罷不能。無論你是在機場、公車或者火車上，它都是一個消磨時間的好方法。雖然這個遊戲類似Bubble Pop和Frozen Bubble但它本身俱有獨特的優勢。<p>泡泡龍在功能和控制方面都類似一般傳統的泡泡射擊遊戲。像往常一樣，遊戲的目標是調整你的槍的角度，並把它安置在正確的位置。然後用手指點擊，炸開顏色相同的泡泡。當你同時炸開越多的泡泡，分數就會越高。這個遊戲能讓你玩上癮是因為它​​有幾個關卡。喜歡競爭的人肯定會愛上這個遊戲的街機版本。</p><p>毫無疑問的，泡泡龍是一個免費又能夠消除枯燥心情的遊戲。遊戲的界面精美又簡約。而設計則是精湛和完美的。整個遊戲操作起來非常順暢，你在瞬間就能感受到。這個遊戲肯定會讓你欲罷不能！泡泡瘋狂地從四處彈出來！你可以隨時繼續遊戲而不丟失任何進展。這是一個靈巧的小功能，遊戲的操作順暢和完美，它幾乎從來不會有任何故障。所以請放鬆地坐著，隨著七彩的泡泡把你身上的壓力全都消除掉。</p><p></p> ----------製品紹介----------<p>世界初！？スマホ版３Ｄアダルトゲームがついに登場！</p><p>イリュージョン最強のハイクオリティアニメシェーダー美少女ゲームがアンドロイドＯＳで遊べちゃう！</p><p>「俺が主人公 ～ナカに入って俺がダす！～」は天使の女の子達が様々なＨシチュエーションやコスチュームで、主人公にご奉仕したりお仕置きされちゃったりする、オムニバスタイプのアニメ３Ｄアドベンチャーゲームです！</p><p>----------こちらは体験版となります----------</p><p>・１章のストーリーモードまでをプレイできます。<br>・いたずらやＨはできません。</p><p>製品版の販売はアキバイン.comにて<br>「http://www.akibain.com/d10/」</p><p>■■■■■■注意事項■■■■■■<br>1．本アプリはプレイ時にリソースデータをダウンロードします。<br>Wifiなどのネット環境化でプレイしていただくことをお勧めします。</p><p>2．本アプリは３Dデータを描画した高負荷のアプリとなっております。<br>そのためプレイ時に端末の温度が上がる場合がございます。<br>また、多くの電池を使用しますので充電の確保をお願い致します。</p><p>3．お使いの端末によっては動作に遅延が発生する場合がございます。</p><p>4．同時にいくつものアプリを起動している場合、動作が不安定になることがあります。<br>その場合、他のアプリをタスクマネージャー等で終了していただくことにより改善する場合がございます。</p><p>5．Android OSのバージョンアップにより正常にインストールが出来ない場合がございますので、ご注意ください。</p><p>6．アプリの起動やリソースデータのダウンロードに失敗する場合は、アプリをアンインストール後<br>再インストールをお試しください。</p><p>7．本サービス利用に関わる一切の通信料･接続料はお客様のご負担となります。<br>また、本サービス利用には多くの通信量が発生します。<br>パケット定額サービスに加入されずに多額のパケット通信料が発生した場合や、通信会社が取り決めている一定の通信量を超えた際の速度規制に該当した場合でも、当社は一切の責任を負いません。</p><p><br>※本編「俺が主人公」は4月1日発売予定！<br>18歳未満の方のご購入はできません。ご了承下さい。</p><p>Powered </span> </div>  <div class="description"> 3D戰鬥機模擬器是一個現代空戰中，你作為一名戰鬥機飛行員在F18噴氣飛機可以繞飛的飛機模擬器。作為試點的遊戲過程中，你有機會飛往20個任務。</p><p>主控制：<br>左/右，上/下移動操縱桿來控制戰鬥機噴氣飛機的飛行姿態。使用油門桿向上/向下加速/減速（制動）戰機。</p><p>微調控制：<br>油門桿也可以向右轉/向左微調在飛機飛行過程中的飛行姿態。觸摸的平面圖標，你的飛機在飛行過程中改變任何飛行姿態。</p><p>導航：<br>你可以閱讀導航雷達屏幕上的信息，找到正確的飛行方向。</p><p>更改空中觀點：<br>通過攻駕駛艙圖標，你可以改變來看，進入駕駛艙的看法。從駕駛艙會有一個箭頭，指示正確的方向。<br> <br>遊戲目標：<br>在每個級別，你有一個使命來完成的，例如，你有你的飛機飛到環槽在空氣中或你的飛機降落在指定的停車點。你必須完成的任務指定時間限制。更多的時間留給後完成任務如何金牌獎勵越大。</p><p>3D戰鬥機模擬器 - 遊戲功能<br>- 20種不同的飛機任務 - 著陸，起飛，機場和運營商。<br>- 新改進飛機物理。<br>- 改變你的看法駕駛艙視圖。<br>- 飛先進的的戰鬥機噴氣飛機F18<br>- 時間的挑戰，你可以享受你周圍的天空的風景，但時間是不是就在你身邊。帶上你的飛機，在時間用完之前！<br>- 觀看摩天大樓，否則其求救，求救，這是不是你的飛行生涯。<br>- 你的飛機降落和起飛，從不同的機場和運營商。<br>- 新的航空任務將隨之而來。<br>- 新飛機將增加。</p><p><br>注意！如果進入任何建築物或到地面落入大海或崩潰，你的飛機會崩潰。另外要小心登陸你需要擊中跑道，否則你的飛機會爆炸。</p><p>這是一個新的Android 3D戰鬥機模擬器VascoGames 手机爆破手传奇游戏以其超级毁灭性强力回归，藉此庆祝其十周年生日。借助融合最热智能手机技术的激烈的经典街机射击游戏，傲气雄鹰2014以其不可思议的新游戏玩法，让玩家体验滚动发射的乐趣。 <p>十年以前，IGN说，“简而言之，傲气雄鹰游戏精妙绝伦”。傲气雄鹰游戏获得难以置信总分10分中的9.5分，自此，登上早期手机游戏舞台。 </p><p>如今，它再次回归。比之前更庞大，更粗犷和更激烈。 </p><p>十周年纪念版以其震撼的三维画面、直观的触屏控件和强大的连续数小时爆炸的升级系统，将系列游戏推向高峰。 <br>每周推出新关联赛，阁下可与其他众多傲气雄鹰2014玩家一决雌雄，获胜者和拯救被击落的飞行员都可获得大奖！ <br>最热射手不会被颠覆，但是，因为自己可以升级军舰和多次深入非常战场，爽快的游戏玩法和海量成绩会让休闲玩家和狂热游戏迷入迷。 </p><p>特色: <br>* Not enough? There is much more in Manuganu. Avoid swinging hammers and jump over moving ice blocks. Don’t get burned and jump between walls to collect coins and medallions. Break stone blocks and activate platforms before you fall into fog and much more...</p><p>A RUNNING ADVENTURE</p><p>Manuganu is a 3D side- scroller running game, in which you control the boy “Manuganu”.<br>Unlike other usual running games, Manuganu brings on the “Halt feature” to avoid swinging rocks, hammers, flames and other enemies with the right timing. Another important feature of Manuganu is the ability to switch from “running” mode to “rope climbing” mode when needed. But be careful! This mode has its own challenges.</p><p>GAME FEATURES</p><p>•Platforming Actions: Double Jumping, Wall Sliding, Hovering, Wall Jumping, Rolling, Breaking Stone Blocks<br>•Run through 30 different levels, each with it’s own unique design according to the level theme.<br>•Two button controls and specific swipe controls.<br>•Run into alternate paths to get 3 Star in all Levels.<br>•Three Killer is #1 FPS zombie shooter game that combines the timeless appeal of classic action games with crisp graphics.</p><p>The year is 2048 and something terrible, the T-virus, has been unleashed from subway unto the world.   Super Cat World 2 : Super Hard  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Chis+Dan+PFA" title="Chis Dan PFA">Chis Dan PFA</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.catmario2.hd"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGNvbS5jYXRtYXJpbzIuaGQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Super Cat World 2 (known as "Syobon Action" or "Neko Mario") is a Jump 'n' Run Game parody of old platformer games. The traps are different from what you would expect from a jump and run game. Skill and a bit of imagination are needed and nerves of steel because it can be frustrating at times (which makes the game so addicting).<br>The challenge is to beat the game by loosing as few lives as possible.<p>This game is the spiritual successor to the original Super Cat World . The current application includes the original 4 levels of the unofficial sequel to Syobon Action with plenty differences (new traps), so if you played the sequel don't be "shy" and play it again because it will certainly surprise you.</p><p>The original freeware version of Syobon Action was developed by ちく (Chiku) (http://www.geocities.jp/z_gundam_tanosii/home/Main.html).</p><p></p> <span ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>★★★★★미니게임 점프점프 업데이트★★★★★<p>옐로우와 레드의 톡톡 튀는 점프점프!<br>5번째 미니게임이 오픈하였습니다.</p><p>점프점프 플레이 영상을 국가에 수출되어 인기리에 방영중인,<br>국민 애니메이션 '라바'(Larva)가 스마트폰 코믹 육성 게임으로 탄생!!<br>최강 콤비 옐로우, 레드의 슬랩스틱 코믹 액션과 통통 튀는 사운드를 통해 게임의 재미는 2배!!<br>중독성 강한 미니게임부터 나만의 스타일로 꾸밀 수 있는 라바 전용 데코 아이템까지!<br>간단한 원 터치로 즐기는 라바와의 특별한 교감! 식탐 많은 옐로우와 까칠한 성격의 레드를<br>최강 코믹 듀오로 육성해보세요~</p><p>◆ 마이라바?<br>애니메이션 속 “라바(LARVA)”를 핸드폰에서 만날 수 있습니다.</p><p>◆ 미니게임<br>심플하지만 중독성 강한 게임을 통해 라바의 또 다른 재미를 느낄 수 있습니다.</p><p>① 짝짝짝<br>우리는 이심전심! 같은 카드를 빨리빨리 찾아보자!!</p><p>② 뽁뽁뽁<br>바이올렛 너 이리와!! 가만 안 두겠어~</p><p>③ 러브러브<br>♡꽁냥꽁냥♡ 핑크와의 로맨틱한 비눗방울 데이트!!</p><p>④ 팡팡팡<br>비밀번호를 풀어 깡통 안에 갇힌 핑크 구하기 대 작전!!</p><p>⑤ 점프점프<br>맛있게 과일먹기! 장애물을 피해서 방귀로 뿡뿡 점프점프!!</p><p>◆ 아기자기하고 귀여운 아이템<br>라바가 좋아하는 소시지부터 놓칠 수 없는 푸딩까지!! 아기자기한 아이템과<br>나만의 스타일로 꾸밀 수 있는 라바 전용 데코 아이템!</p><p>◆ 원 터치 교감<br>간단한 터치를 통해 옐로우, 레드와 교감을 할 수 있습니다</p><p>◆ 다양한 이벤트<br>푸짐하고 다양한 이벤트가 준비되어 있습니다. 확인하고 선물 받아가세요~</p><p>* 옐로우, 레드에게 소시지 먹이면 에너지 증가!<br> - 라바가 좋아하는 음식을 먹이면 에너지가 쌓여, 재미있는 미니게임을 할 수 있어요</p><p>* 미니게임도 하고 랭킹도 올리고~<br> - 친구들과 함께해서 즐거운 마이라바! 미니게임 점수 올리고! 랭킹도 올리고! 게임 결과에 따라 보상은 보너스!</p><p>* 다양한 데코 full of monsters, branching path choices, rare events, and fragile pottery.</p><p>Features:<br>- Unlock and equip many special abilities and Supermoves.<br>- Ride a dinosaur that shoots lasers out of its mouth.<br>- Character customization.<br>- Punch an egg that turns you into a magical gnome.<br>- Do quests to earn really fancy hats.<br>- Combo system where you launch enemies into each other from across the map.<br>- Tablet support!</p><p>Punch Quest is a collaboration between Rocketcat Games (Hook Champ, Mage Gauntlet) and Madgarden (Saucelifter, Sword of Fargoal).</p><p>Brought to 年，不是小餐館和食物，它暴露出長期環境為代價的短期工業增益的謬論。<br>短跑這一切，這是關鍵的一年，人類必須逃到深藏在宇宙，發現新生活天體遠離星系，但他們遇到外來敵人的金屬，並阻止他們。<br>這是遊戲的一場戰爭。你一定要殺狙擊手和不知疲倦的捍衛者人權，所有金屬的敵人殺死。<br>在這個令人興奮的冒險，你準備一決與冰凍敵人。<br>我們做一個叫瘋狂的太空船的計畫，目標是找到火種和珠寶，罷工的怪物敵人並摧毀他們的基地。<p>遊戲特色：<br>— 现拥有65种游戏模式！且完全免费！】<br>◈【更多模式，更多颜色，更多乐器，更多逼格，更多选择，更多欢乐！】<br>【极丝滑，尽豪华】 —— 全新设计的触感系统，用户体验提升3倍以上，与全新的65种模式更加紧密的结合，相得益彰！<br>【0收费】—— 我们承诺游戏中不包含任何内购及收费点！<br>【更少广告】—— 广告更少，欢乐更多！<br>【摇摇欲坠】—— <br>-65种精彩的游戏模式，满足你一整天的游戏需求。<br>-全新的自动化染色系统，省去繁琐的操作。<br>-多种乐器可选，下一秒，你就是超人气明星。<br>-全球排行榜系统。<br>-简单耐玩，老少皆宜。<br>-优美的钢琴音效，数十首经典歌曲等你演绎。<br>-无可比拟的操作体验，弹指间，心无间。<br>-社交网络分享，快和小伙伴们一同分享吧。</p><p>◈ ◈ 【游戏模式】◈ ◈ <br>-【经典模式】：用最快的速度完成20/50/100/200块儿。<br>-【街机模式】：没有任何限制，看你能拿多少分，注意，速度会越来越快。<br>-【限时模式】：限时10/30/60/100秒，看你能踩多少格子.<br>-【超速模式】：速度变得更块，看你的平均速度能达到多少。<br>-【惊险模式】：红色的危险格子混杂在黑格子中间，千万不要碰到他们。<br>-【竞赛模式】：每局10秒，完成一定数量的块儿，若当局时间有剩余，则累计到下一局，依此类推。看你能玩到第几关，注意，目标数量会越来越大。<br>-【接力模式】：需要在10秒内完成50个黑块儿，然后接着玩下去，直到碰到白块或者时间结束。<br>-【地狱模式】：颤抖吧，盆友。6排6列的地狱模式，你需要10指并用。<br>-【对战模式】：同台PK吧，骚年！<br>-【多彩模式】：用彩色的格子代替了原来的黑色格子，保护眼睛，避免疲劳<br>-【双骄模式】：双倍块儿，等你去挑战。<br>-【闪电模式】：闪电风暴接近中，夜幕降临，一切只能靠你的直觉。<br>-【小三模式】：史上最具挑战性的小三模式，你能征服她吗。<br>-【贱鸟模式】：像素鸟与白块儿的完美融合，一切显得那么自然，那么美妙。<br>-【冰封模式】：来自极地尘封千年的冰结界，一起来感受千年之外的怒吼吧。<br>-【侧入模式】：侧入，飞一般的感觉。<br>-【心跳模式】：“嘭，嘭嘭”，每一次心跳，都是爱与恨的纠缠，更是生和死的考验。<br>-【过山车模式】： 直上云霄，坠入谷底，冰火两重天的节奏。<br>-【跑酷模式】： 完美融入当下最流行的跑酷游戏模式，体验不一样的白块之旅吧。<br>-【跨栏模式】： 包含“单排，双排，三拍，四种”4种子模式。<br>-【惊喜模式】： 包含 “正常，炸弹”2种模式，更多惊喜等着你。<br>-【抓小鸡模式】：块儿是有思想的，他会瞬移到你意想不到的地方。能抓得住吗。<br>-【转体模式】：块儿在移动过程中会随机转换方向。<br>-【移动模式】：抓住那个狡猾的方块！<br>-【基友模式】：快把缠绵的二人分开！<br>-【滑你妹模式】：滑动下面的块儿，使其和上面相同或相反！<br>-【摇摆模式】：想知道摇摇欲坠的感觉吗？<br>-【地震模式】：地震还是车震？<br>-【好色模式】：色狼，色鬼，色魔，色仙，你是哪一个？<br>-【暴雪模式】：风雪来了，花月在哪？<br>-【烛光模式】：人点烛，鬼吹灯，尽量不要让蜡烛熄灭了，否则...<br>-【魔立方】：一个会跳跃的方块。</p><p>友情提醒：适度游戏益脑，沉迷游戏伤身，请朋友们注意身体，多多休息！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Hungry Snake  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=emersoft" title="emersoft">emersoft</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="pl.mr03.hsnake"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDnBsLm1yMDMuaHNuYWtlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Hungry Snake is a classic snake game, like the one that used to be in old mobile phones but with better graphics. You have to eat everything that appears on the screen, the most important are apples:<br>- red - give you 10 points<br>- gold - the amount of points depends on how fast you eat them, it can give a maximum of 100 points<p>You can also collect special items:<br>- scissors - they make your snake shorter<br>- ice - slows down the snake</p><p>The special items and gold apples last only 10 seconds. The faster you get them the better bonus they give.</p><p>You have three types of control. The default one is relative. If the snake is moving horizontally, you need to touch the screen above or below the snake to make him go up or down. If he moves virtically, you need to touch the screen on the snake's right or left to make him go in the adequate direction.<br>Please watch the promo video if you have a problem with steering.</p><p>The game also include 7 different maps and 3 snake skins.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" </span> </div>  <div class="description">  次時代 柏青哥 ( Next Generation Pachinko )<br>實際柏青哥彈珠台還沒有上市之前，首先以手機遊戲形式來登場的次世代柏青哥機！完美的移植開發中的柏青哥店版本，全新的界面、玩法、得分方式、特效！<br>特有輕快動感無與倫比的音效，真正的獨領風騷！<p>精美的畫面表現方式別具一格，多種多樣的海洋魚類<br>這也形成了遊戲的獨特風格，當玩家進入“立直“狀態之時，<br>出現“鯨魚“鯊魚”海頓“以提示中獎等級<br>，獎勵效果十分絢麗，無盡的免費彈珠及方便玩家的自動模式，<br>無論何時何地，你都可以打開遊戲，進行一次精彩紛呈的海底旅行。</p><p>專業工作室出品的遊戲音效給你聽覺的饕餮盛宴<br>特色的場景和音樂令你目不暇接</p><p>日本柏青哥歷史：<br>柏青哥的彈球類遊戲是非常受歡迎的日本，可以在美國許多賭場被發現。術語柏青哥是從日本詞帕奇，帕奇，意思細小物體的點擊或火災的劈啪聲。<br>而柏青哥的來歷不明，但極有可能從“Coringth遊戲”起源於美國芝加哥的後裔。在遊戲中出現的日本在1920年初，第一彈球室在大阪府被打開了。<br>竹市Masamura被稱為當今的柏青哥的創始人，因為他開發的“Masamura計”，指甲，成為基礎當今大多數的柏青哥機台的佈置。在1980年的彈珠機成為電腦，現在有聲音和圖像，使遊戲更加精彩。</p><p></p><p></p> <div class="description">  自己準備在今年最大的遊戲之一。成為一個超級英雄，證明自己在為您的手機這個新的遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲給大家。 “美國鐵警察”是一個簡單但很容易上癮的機械戰警無盡的格鬥遊戲迷的戰鬥。你就可以開始享受遊戲的移動電話的世界。  美國鋼鐵警察是從一個鋼鐵基地強大的金屬混合組成;他有兩個超級英雄“鋼鐵俠”和“機械戰警”的權力。他得到了鋼鐵俠和力量的速度從機械戰警捕獲外星人。美國鋼鐵警察使用超級跳的能力得到快速從一個太空球到另一個。  為數不多的外星人的太空船已進入地球軌道，沒有警告。全球衛星通信的損失使世界處於危險之中。這是沒有任務的普通男人因為你從一球跳到另一個在速度快。穿越所有的球，收集所有晶體，你可以和要小心不要摔倒，因為如果你這樣做，對外星人的戰爭將會丟失。  您需要保存的晶體外星人，因為如果他們把他們的話，將很難對他們生存。所以一定要確保你有所有的晶體，而從一球跳躍到另一個。下載我們的令人難以置信的比賽，成為打擊犯罪的時候了。享受鋼鐵俠和機械戰警的特點在一個令人難以置信的比賽。  如何玩“美鐵警察”： 遊戲的控制是如此簡單;你需要跳轉從一球到另一個。所有的球旋轉;你需要通過簡單的觸摸屏幕跳上他們。當鐵警察傾斜朝皮球稍稍水龍頭上的球，你將在下一球。您可以一次過跳兩次，確保你的球安全地降落，除非你能觸摸屏多一次到達球。  你需要得到所有的晶體，並確保外星人不會得到晶體，並注意不要在球落下，因為如果你這樣做，你需要再次重播。  “美國鋼鐵警察”的特點： 1.本場比賽是絕對的樂趣和控制是那麼容易，即使是很小的孩子可以享受遊戲的樂趣。 兩個超級英雄2.獨特的組合包“鋼鐵俠”和“機械戰警” 3.無盡的水平純粹的動作！ 4.獲取所有的晶體和獎品，使高分，這有助於你挑戰你的朋友。 5.如果你得到所有的晶體，然後你會得到連擊，這將帶來更多的積分。 6.您將獲得不同的成就，如王子，公爵和國王。因此，嘗試採取更多的晶體。 7.美麗的高品質的圖形和背景，它讓你沉迷於這個遊戲。 8.專為孩子們誰愛像鐵人賽和超級英雄鐵甲威龍設計！  通過不斷提供美國鋼鐵警察水晶，可以確保達到最大的身份。也許只是一個有點極端，但是可以肯定的是好玩，很難掌握。從一個球跳到另一個以增加的速度，同時收集盡可能多的結晶成為可能。擊敗你的朋友的高分！考驗你的耐力和反應！ Andrio's World (Free)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Joerg+Jahnke" title="Joerg Jahnke">Joerg class="description">  這是一款跑跳遊戲，您必須操縱您的遊戲主角通過充斥著怪獸的各個關卡。您可以一路收集硬幣和其他貴重物品來增加分數。此款遊戲有 45 個關卡，難度逐級上升，並可生成數千種隨機關卡。<p>您可以通過全球排行榜與其他玩家一較高下並可接受挑戰。</p><p>可使用外接 class="description">  如果你非常喜歡鑽石類型的遊戲，又非常喜歡古埃及文化，那你一定要玩埃及豔后寶藏。<p>遊戲特色：<br>- 超過90個關卡和3個神秘的埃及場景。<br>- 容易上手精通很難。<br>- 一流的UI的設計。<br>- 來自埃及神秘的背景音樂。</p><p>怎麼玩：<br>- 匹配三個寶石和更多的寶石消除寶石。<br>- 消去寶石後，背景方塊就會改變直到半透明。<br>- 匹配4顆寶石可以得到一個閃電，閃電會消除寶藏一整行。<br>- 匹配5顆寶石的十字架圖案，可以得到兩個閃電。<br>- 匹配5顆寶石在同一行或列，將清楚所有的相同的寶石。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.twopxmob.game.jewelsdeluxe" title="珠寶豪華版"> 389.    珠寶豪華版  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.twopxmob.game.jewelsdeluxe"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS50d29weG1vYi5nYW1lLmpld2Vsc2RlbHV4ZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  歡迎光臨珠寶豪華版（傳奇罩）：<br>珠寶豪華版是一個匹配3益智遊戲經典和令人上癮的遊戲和任務。交換和匹配的寶石通過自己的方式在許多層面，你可以。尤其是在這個遊戲中你可以與你的朋友在遊戲中心玩，看看誰得到的最高分數。<p>HOW TO PLAY<br>✔像另一個經典的寶石傳說遊戲，只是換了寶石，在一條線上，以摧毀他們匹配3。<br>✔到達等級目標（經典，時間，無盡的），或者使板tranparent（街機）來傳遞的水平。</p><p>遊戲模式<br>✔經典模式：你必須達到寶石目標分數要到一個新的水平，並盡量保持珠寶板始終有一個匹配至少。遊戲結束了，如果沒有更多的匹配。<br>✔街機模式：你必須清除所有的寶石背板去一個新的水平之前的時間到了。<br>✔時間攻擊模式：你必須匹配盡可能多的寶石，你可以填寫完整的得分進步。分數進步是通過時間縮短。<br>✔無盡模式：你必須達到寶石目標分數要到一個新的水平，並去就可以。遊戲結束了，如果你退出。</p><p>遊戲特色<br>✔6種不同的經典珠寶的傳奇和許多特殊的珠寶與強大的效應：寶石炸彈爆炸，雷霆寶石火焰，顏色寶石的明星。<br>✔4的經典和傳奇模式：經典，街機，時間攻擊，無窮無盡。<br>✔分享，並通過遊戲領導委員會與您的朋友最高分數進行比較。<br>✔許多上癮和有興趣的成就。<br>✔不錯的高清顯卡，很酷的動畫，令人振奮的音樂和聲音效果<br>✔簡單而有趣的開始，但一個挑戰來獲得3星在每個級別<br>如果你愛的比賽3豪華珠寶或鑽石遊戲，你必須嘗試珠寶豪華版。有樂趣和享受遊戲的樂趣。</p><p>我們熱愛珠寶豪華版。如果你也這樣做，請評價寶石遊戲，分享給你的朋友，邀請他們和你一起玩，並告訴我們你的想法。您的反饋有助於我們做出珠寶豪華版更好，並保持更新來了！<br>像我們在Facebook上：https://www.facebook.com/pages/2PXMob/582577748427378<br>遇到問題珠寶豪華版？請發郵件給我們：contact.2pxmob Zombie Derby  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=HeroCraft+Ltd" title="HeroCraft Ltd">HeroCraft Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.herocraft.game.zombiederby"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5oZXJvY3JhZnQuZ2FtZS56b21iaWVkZXJieRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Do you have the drive to survive? Real men have two favourite things; cars and guns. And no stinking zombie apocalypse is going to change that. Take control of your car to see how far you can get and how many zombies you can kill – and if you can actually escape with your brains intact.  6 cars are available to get you to the final fort, each capable of holding progressively more loot. Ranging from the simple Redneck pick-up and the classy Hunter and to the tough Sledge and frankly-silly Harvester, you’ll enjoy throwing these bodged-up jalopies at the lines of the undead. Each is highly customisable, with 15 upgrades including spiked bumpers, improved tyres, buffed engines, and more ammo, fuel and nitros. With 5 locations to traverse, handsome 3D graphics and gory shambling bodies, Zombie Derby is a killer game. How far can you get before they get YOU?<p><br>• 6 killer cars to drive<br>• 5 vast levels to explore<br>• Massively customisable vehicles<br>• Gory 3D graphics<br>• Compatible with HD devices<br>• Addictive gameplay</p><p>"All in all, Zombie Derby is a polished and playable game, with well-designed controls, nice presentation, and a deceptively addictive Groundhog Day structure"  -  PocketGamer  -  bronze award</p><p>8/10 "Easy to play, hard to put down." - androidrundown.com </p><p>7/10 "Zombie Derby is an entertaining title that puts a different spin on the zombie genre." - pocketgamer.co.uk </p><p>4/5 "If you're a fan of fast cars and destruction then this is a game that's just right for you. class="description">  The goal of the game is to get the balls through the glass by tapping on the screen and releasing the balls. Each ball you get through the cup rewards you with a different amount of points, depending on the color of the cup. If the ball misses the glass, it disappears. When you lose all of your balls, the game is over. <p>Your earned points can then be spent on purchasing new cups, which score you more points than the basic ones.</p><p>Throughout the levels, from 1 to 30, the difficulty of the game progresses. Every 10 levels the size of the cups decreases, making the game a challenging and an exciting experience!</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.magmamobile.game.shooter.free" title="星際大戰"> 396.    星際大戰  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.magmamobile.game.shooter.free"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5tYWdtYW1vYmlsZS5nYW1lLnNob290ZXIuZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  砲擊敵人，在星際中征戰航行！<p>星際大戰是來自Magma Mobile 的最新街機遊戲。遊戲源自經典的太空射擊遊戲。<br>這個射擊遊戲將讓你沉浸在科幻逼真的太空環境中，你將操控一艘戰艦，迎戰一波波的敵人！</p><p>這個射擊遊戲容易上手，但是難以精通！事實上，玩家需要記住各個關卡和敵人攻擊的模式，以反擊敵人的砲火。使用砲火增強道具對你征戰很有用的哦！</p><p>建議你先試試“進化”模式，在宇宙中征戰前行，向各關的Boss挑戰，贏取星星，以在遊戲商店中購買各種物品。然後，如果你充滿遊戲天賦的話，你可以解鎖生存模式和無數成就！</p><p>你還可以定制你的太空戰艦以提高你的技能（生命，攻擊，防衛等等）。</p><p>這個高清畫質的射擊遊戲將帶給核心玩家非凡的體驗，同時對休閒玩家來說也很容易上手。</p><p>快來加入星際大戰吧！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> MAME4droid (0.37b5)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Seleuco" title="Seleuco">Seleuco</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.seleuco.mame4all"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5zZWxldWNvLm1hbWU0YWxsEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  MAME4droid is a version of iMAME4all (Jailbroken iPhone, iPad) for Android, all of them developed by David Valdeita (Seleuco), port of MAME 0.37b5 emulator by Nicola Salmoria and TEAM, and it is based on GP2X, WIZ MAME4ALL 2.5 by Franxis. <p>MAME4droid emulates arcade games supported by original MAME 0.37b5 plus some additional games from newer MAME versions.</p><p>This version emulates over 2000 different romsets.  </p><p>Please, try to understand that that with that amount of games, some will run better than others and some might not even run with MAME4droid. <br>Please, don't email me asking for a specific game to run.</p><p>Owners of older devices should not expect good performance. Tips to help performance: use lower quality sound or switch it off, use 8 bit depth, underclock the CPU and Sound CPUs. Disable stick and buttons animations and disable smooth scaling also.</p><p>After installing, place your MAME-titled zipped roms in /sdcard/ROMs/MAME4all/roms folder.</p><p>MAME4droid uses only MAME4droid &amp; iMAME4all uses only '0.37b5', 'GP2X, WIZ 0.37b11 mame romset'. Use "clrmame.dat" file included in /sdcard/ROMs/MAME4all/ to convert romsets from other MAME versions to the ones used by this version, using ClrMAME Pro utility, available in this URL:</p><p>http://mamedev.emulab.it/clrmamepro/</p><p>MAME4droid will never have "save states" since it is based on a MAME version that does not support it. </p><p>Official web page for news, source code &amp; additional information:</p><p>http://code.google.com/p/imame4all/</p><p>To see MAME license, go to the end of this document.</p><p>Features<br>------------<br>Support for 2.1 and upper Android devices. <br>Native support for Android Honeycomb tablets.<br>Android 3.0 (Honeycomb) 2D Hardware Accelerated.<br>Autorotate.<br>HW Keys remapping.<br>Touch Controller can be shown/hidden.<br>Smooth image.<br>Overlay Filters, scalines, CRT..<br>Digital or Analog touch selectable.<br>Animated touch stick or DPAD.<br>iON's iCade and iCP (as iCade mode) external controllers supported. <br>Wiimote support using WiiCrotroller Market app.<br>1 to 6 buttons optionally shown.<br>Options for video aspect ratio, scaling, rotate.<br>Adjustable CPU, Audio clock.</p><p>MAME license</p><p>http://www.mame.net</p><p>http://www.mamedev.com</p><p>Copyright © 1997-2010, Nicola Salmoria and the MAME team. Some Samsung Galaxy phones needs Android 2.2 or higher.<br>• GPU support for OpenGL ES 2.0<br>• Works on all resolutions, from 320x240 to Full HD etc.<br>• If your device is incompatible, please send e-mail (english or finnish) so I can see if it can be fixed. (Due to variation of Android devices I cannot guarantee full compatibility)</p><p>• Tested on Nexus 5, Galaxy Tab 7.0 Plus, Archos 70, XPeria GO, Galaxy Mini and Galaxy Gio.</p><p></p><p>Spin-Tops is still in beta so there could be some bugs and missing features. 430.    MAME4droid  (0.139u1)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Seleuco" title="Seleuco">Seleuco</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.seleuco.mame4droid"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5zZWxldWNvLm1hbWU0ZHJvaWQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  MAME4droid (0.139u1) is developed by David Valdeita (Seleuco) as a port of the MAME 0.139 emulator by Nicola Salmoria and the MAME team. It emulates arcade games supported by this version of MAME which includes over 8000 different ROMs.<p>* MAME4droid  is an EMULATOR and DOES NOT INCLUDE ROMS OR COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL OF ANY KIND.</p><p>This version of MAME4droid was designed to be used with dual-core Android devices because it is based on the PC MAME version which requires higher specifications than the older versions.</p><p>Even with a high end device, do not expect "modern" arcade games from the 90s and beyond to necessarily work at full speed or compatibility. Some games like Outrun and the Mortal Kombat series are badly optimized and require at least a 1.5ghz dual core device.</p><p>With over 8000 games supported, some games will run better than others; some games may not run at all. It is impossible to support such a vast number of titles, so please do not email the developer asking for support for a specific game.</p><p>After installing, place your MAME-titled zipped roms in /sdcard/MAME4droid/roms folder.</p><p>This MAME4droid version uses only '0.139' romset.</p><p>Official web page for news, source code &amp; additional information:</p><p>https://sourceforge.net/projects/mame4droid/</p><p>FEATURES</p><p>Native support for NVidia Shield Portable and Tablet devices<br>Autorotate with individual settings for portrait and landscape orientation<br>HW Keys remapping<br>Touch Controller can be toggled on and off<br>Image smoothing (including new HQx smoothing up to HQ4x)<br>Integer-based scaling for purest game recreation at higher resolutions<br>Overlay filters including scanlines, CRT, etc.<br>Digital or Analog touch selectable<br>Animated touch stick or DPAD<br>Customizable In-App button layout<br>iON's iCade and iCP (as iCade mode) external controllers supported<br>Plug and play support for most Bluetooth and USB Gamepads<br>Tilt Sensor replacement for joystick movement<br>Touch lightgun with auto-detection option<br>Mouse support for Nvidia Shield devices<br>Display 1 to 6 buttons on screen<br>Netplay over local WiFi<br>Options for video aspect ratio, scaling, rotate, etc.</p><p>MAME LICENSE</p><p>http://mamedev.org</p><p>Copyright © 1997-2015, Nicola Salmoria and the MAME team. All rights reserved. </p><p>Redistribution and use of this code or any derivative works are permitted provided that the following conditions are met: </p><p>* Redistributions may not be sold, nor may they be used in a commercial product or activity. </p><p>* Redistributions that are modified from the original source must include the complete source code, including the source code for all components used by a binary built from the modified sources. However, as a special exception, the source code distributed need not include  anything that is normally distributed (in either source or binary form) with the major components (compiler, kernel, and so on) of the operating system on which the executable runs, unless that component itself accompanies the executable. </p><p>* Redistributions must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution. </p><p>THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  這是一個非常經典的坦克遊戲。幾乎每個人都應該玩過這種類型遊戲。 <p>我們修改了這坦克遊戲，並把它帶回21世紀。 <br>“坦克大戰 - 迷你戰爭”已是第二代了，第一代是“超級坦克大戰”。<br>“迷你戰爭”繼承了”超級坦克大戰”的所有優點，並且增加了許多新的元素。 </p><p>遊戲規則： <br>- 防禦你的基地 <br>- 消滅所有敵人坦克 <br>- 如果你的坦克或基地被摧毀，遊戲便會結束</p><p>遊戲特點： <br>- 5個不同的難度級別（從易到瘋狂） <br>- 3個不同的遊戲區（正常、危險、噩夢） <br>- 6種不同類型敵人坦克<br>- 您的坦克可以上升3個等級<br>- 輔助坦克，現在你可以命令它原地警戒<br>- 許多不同類型的地圖物件，你可以在截圖看到 <br>- 每個地圖物件都可以破壞 <br>- 4種不同大細的地圖有26X26，28X28，30X30 和 32×32 <br>- 協助物件，它可以幫助你完成遊戲 <br>- 內有110張地圖可以玩</p><p>* 不同難度級別，應該滿足不同人的需要。高手可以直接選擇瘋狂程度。 <br>** 當完成正常區域，危險區域將被打開。完成危險區後，噩夢區域也會打開。在危險、噩夢區的敵人力量會大大增加。 <br>*** 每2〜4個月，我們將增加50張新地圖，就好像“超級坦克大戰”。“超級坦克大戰”現在已增至500的地圖了。</p><p>------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>“超級坦克大戰”</p><p>Facebook: In Slido, each of your color buckets has three levels of health. You can recover your health level by catching a special energy up block. You can also catch a shield block that will protect your color bucket when you catch  the wrong block.<p>Minimalistic graphic design and great music will make your experience even more enjoyable! 無料ゲームカテゴリで1位を獲得！今注目の射的ゲーム！！<p>「the射的！」は、縁日などでお馴染の射的が楽しめるゲームです。屋台に並べられたいろいろな景品を銃で撃ってGETしながらコレクションしていこう！</p><p>アプリは加速度センサーを使用しているので、端末を銃に見たてて本物の射的さながら遊べます。</p><p>端末を上下左右に傾けながら上手く景品に照準を合わて、指を離し、コルクを発射！銃を上下にスワイプすると景品との距離も縮められます。</p><p>遊び方はとっても簡単。クマからコインをもらい（1コイン5発）、景品を狙ってコルクを撃つだけ！</p><p>弾道やコルクの飛距離、手ぶれなど、景品を落とすにはちょっとコツが必要だけど、コツをつかめば驚くほど射的の腕が上がっていきます！</p><p>ちょっと射的は苦手・・・という方でも、遊べば遊ぶほどハマっていくこと間違いなし★</p><p>景品の種類は100種類以上。レベルを上げると出現する景品が増えていくので、撃って落として、どんどん景品を集めていこう！<br>でも、中には普通の銃ではびくともしない景品も・・・！そんな時は、銃や弾をアップグレードしていくのがポイント。<br>景品をGETして貯めたポイントで、銃や弾を強化することができます。</p><p>散弾銃、レーザー銃、バズーカといった特別な効果があるスペシャル弾をGETできることもあるので、それらを上手く使っていくのも景品を集めていくコツです。<br>屋台ごと吹き飛ばすバズーカを使って全景品を落とした時の爽快感はたまりません…！</p><p>GETした景品は、拡大して360度さまざまな角度から眺めることも出来ちゃいます。</p><p>また、なかなか屋台に置かれないレアな景品が流れてくるスペシャルゾーンが現れたり、いきなり敵キャラが現れて、それを時間内に撃退するクエストが発生したりと、楽しいイベント要素も満載です！</p><p>一定レベルに達すると、時間内に景品を落としていく「早撃ちタイムアタック」で遊べます！<br>弾は無制限。景品を全て落とすと、景品のレベルに応じてコインももらえます。<br>（初回のみ1コイン必要になりますが、1度クリアすればコインを払わずに遊べます。）</p><p>全部の景品を集めて、射的王を目指そう！</p><p>≪the射的！のポイント≫<br>◆加速度センサー付きで、本物の射的で遊んでいる感覚が楽しめる！<br>◆銃の狙いを定める時の傾きの縦軸・横軸の反転機能が付いているので、自分の得意な方法で景品を狙える！<br>◆仰向けになってプレイできる、「寝ながらモード」を搭載！<br>◆レアアイテムが流れてくるスペシャルゾーンの出現や、ボスキャラを制限時間内に倒すクエストなど、イベント要素も満載で飽きない！<br>◆スペシャル弾で一気に景品をGETできるのが気持ちいい！バズーカを打った時はまさに快感・・・！<br>◆コルクを打つ音やゲーム内で流れる音で、本当に縁日に来ているような気分に！</p><p>≪射的の遊び方≫<br>１：コルクを貰う（1コイン5発）<br>２：景品をＧＥＴ！<br>３：集めたポイントで銃をアップグレード！</p><p>≪スペシャル弾一覧≫<br>ＧＥＴすると特別な効果がある弾を撃てる！<br>◆散弾銃：多数の小さい弾が発射！一気に商品GETのチャンス★<br>◆レーザー銃：レーザーを照射して、重たい景品も簡単に落とせる！<br>◆バズーカ：爆風で屋台ごと吹き飛ばす、超レア弾！</p><p>≪the射的！の攻略方法≫<br>◆コルクや銃のアップグレードは早めにしよう！<br>　コルクや銃は、各々3段階のグレードがあるので、ポイントが<br>　たまったらすぐにアップグレードするのがポイント。<br>　コルクや銃をアップグレードすると、重い景品や<br>　スペシャルゾーンのレア景品が落としやすくなるよ！</p><p>◆落ちにくい景品は、コルクを当てる場所を変えてみよう！<br>　豚の貯金箱など、ちょっと落としづらいものは足元を狙って<br>　コルクで撃ち上げると落としやすくなるよ。</p><p>◆散弾銃を上手く使おう！<br>　どうしても欲しいけど、なかなか落ちない景品がある…<br>　そんな時は、散弾銃をGETした時がチャンス！<br>　画面をスワイプして景品との距離を近づけ、欲しい景品めがけて<br>　散弾銃を発射！威力が強いので、欲しい景品が手に入りやすくなります。</p><p><br>-株式会社コロプラ提供-</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p Sounds easy? items and skills, various enemies more than 100 kinds appear. <p>Scenario: <br>One time, chickens and human beings lived and exchanged peacefully in their own territories.<br>However, the greedy human started being greedy for chicken species' richness, and chickens fall to human's slaves due to the several chickens who made deals with greedy human. <br>'Wattles', the chicken who got angry at this resolves to revenge on the betrayers. </p><p>Featured: <br>-Providing 4 kinds of weapon(sword, spear, axe and throw). <br>-Providing different sense of hitting for each weapon. <br>-Providing more than 100 kinds of weapon. <br>-Supporting various costume. <br>-Supporting various kinds of skill. </p><p>============================= <br>Support Information: <br>For additional support, please
